entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
